QuestionJSON.Question: Darby has been recruited by a staffing agency to assist with a company's hiring process. They need to create a program algorithm to perform the process of 'Reviewing Applicants' as described by the company: First, an application is received. Next, if the application is complete, it's assigned to a hiring manager. If the application is incomplete, it's set aside. If the hiring manager rates the application positively, schedule an interview. If it's rated negatively, inform the applicant that they won't be moving forward. Which of the following pseudocodes best represents this process?
QuestionJSON.Answer1:
procedure ReviewingApplicants
while applications remain
if application is complete then
assign to hiring manager
if rated positively
schedule interview
else
reject applicant
end if
else
set aside
end if
end while
end procedure
QuestionJSON.Answer2:
procedure ReviewingApplicants
while applications remain
if application is incomplete
set aside
else
assign to hiring manager
if application is incompelete
set aside
else
reject or interview applicant
end if
end if
end while
end procedure
QuestionJSON.Answer3:
procedure ReviewingApplicants
while applications remain
assign to hiring manager
if rated negatively
reject applicant
else
schedule interview
end if
end while
end procedure
QuestionJSON.Answer4:
procedure ReviewingApplicants
while applications remain
if application is complete
assign to hiring manager
if rated negatively
reject applicant
else
schedule interview
end if
end if
end while
end procedure
QuestionJSON.Explanation: The proper pseudocode would include all steps from receiving the application, checking if it's complete or not, assigning it to a hiring manager, up to making a decision based on the manager's rating and either scheduling an interview or rejecting the candidate.
